name: NAIR PICO
description:
-A simple fighting game with one attack-

now more portable than ever!

NAIR PICO is a Pico-8 port of the original game NAIR .

Despite the tiny resolution, the speed and pace of the game have been perfectly preserved. 

  • Every attack you land heals your character, creating satisfying tug-of -war gameplay
  • Teaches spacing, neutral, and fundamentals
  • NEW! View hurtboxes or switch to dark mode straight from the pause menu!
  • Can you master the one-button wavedash?? It's just like mashing! Ultimate players, this is for you!

KNOWN ISSUES:

  • Issue: Some OS's won't allow simultaneously pressing the S key and other keys. Player 2 will have a hard time wavedashing left.
  • Solution: download the game and rebind controls, or use controllers
